name: Infinitely up: Turn the Figure
detailed_description:
Description

Infinitely up: Turn the Figure - this is a casual game, where you build a tower of randomly given out figures, figures have physics. And the difficulty lies in the fact that if you drop at least one figure - you lose. Now it is possible to rotate the shape, which adds more variability. Plan, think tactically, improvise. How high can you build a tower?

Features:

- Interesting and addictive gameplay

- A variety of shapes

- Minimalistic style

- Pleasant music

short_description: Infinitely up: Turn the Figure - this is a casual, logic game using physics, where your need is to build a tower of random figures and not to drop one. Plan, think tactically, improvise. How high can you build a tower?
